recommendationHistory.caption: November 29, 2022, Ralph was senior to David but didn't manage David directly
recommendationHistory.description: I cannot say enough about David’s high level of performance in his M&A role with Stryker.  David’s passion for excellence was evident day in and day out at Stryker.  He was plunged into a critical role, as we were experiencing many roadblocks in executing Purchasing Controls integration with our partner sites in Europe.  David’s willingness to take the reins from day 1, his can-do attitude, and the respect he gained almost immediately from his team members made David a perfect fit for this role.  His personal skill set provided a perfect complement to his business skill set.  David was such an effective conduit to bridge the gaps in language barriers and cultural differences that helped to accelerate completion of action items with our European partners.  David quickly found himself as a teacher and mentor, providing training and understanding to regulatory and compliance items critical to the success of this M&A integration.  The scope and massiveness of this project provided many challenges, and David mastered the taming of these challenges in an utmost professional manner.  In a 1 year span, I have developed a deep and meaningful business and personal relationship with David, one I will greatly miss.  There is no doubt David will be successful in any future endeavors that he wishes to pursue!

recommendationHistory.caption: July 7, 2020, David was senior to Mickaël but didn't manage Mickaël directly
recommendationHistory.description:
I had the pleasure to work with David for 3 years at LEM Switzerland SA, collaborating on many projects. He has strong and broad technical project expertise with a real ability to organize the tasks in a way that lets team demonstrate the full extent of their professional skills. 
With his positive and professional attitude, he has a real talent for communication and negotiation, making sure that the outcome is beneficial for all involved.
I’m sure David will be a great asset to any team he will join.

recommendationHistory.caption: May 12, 2020, Hans-Dieter was senior to David but didn't manage David directly
recommendationHistory.description: I worked with David more then 15 years in his role as quality manager as well as R&D manager in innovation and projects.I really liked to work with him as he has a fast understanding, take the responsibility on his tasks and is giving results in a timely manner. He has a strong backround in technical skills, quality and project management.

Après 20 années d'activité professionnelle notamment dans le secteur industriel de défense, je suis aujourd’hui spécialisée dans le déploiement des méthodologies Lean (organisation et mise en place de procédés d’amélioration continue). I also have the ability to make use of these skills in project management using quality tools, with the knowledge of technical background.

positionHistory.title: Quality Systems Engineer
positionHistory.description:
Pilot the Mercury International Quality Management Systems (QMS) and associated continual improvement to ensure Mercury International compliance with applicable international standards (EN9100 certification), military and civil airworthiness regulations (PART-145 and PART-21G approval), customers and Mercury requirements.

- Airworthiness :
•	Obtain/Maintain airworthiness approvals (EASA) for Mercury approved production and maintenance organizations
•	Prepare and maintain airworthiness related procedures and documentation, including the procedures related the Aviation Safety Management Systems (SMS)
•	Respond to corrective actions issues by applicable airworthiness authorities and/or customers
•	Primary quality focal point of all matters relating to airworthiness
•	Prepare and manage airworthiness approvals surveillance audits
•	Prepare and provide initial and continuation training, including Human Factors (HF) and Safety Management Systems (SMS) trainings as required to maintain airworthiness approvals.

- QMS :
•	Prepare and manage EN/AS9100 recertification and surveillance audits for Mercury International
•	Prepare and maintain quality management system documentation to ensure compliance to EN/AS9100 recertification for Mercury International
•	Prepare and provide training on the quality management system and related topics (FOD, ESD, HF, etc.…)
•	Verify compliance with customer requirements and airworthiness regulations
•	Plan and perform audit internal and external system, product and supplier audits as required (including recording audit data, preparing audit reports, etc.)
•	Monitor, measure and analyze leading QMS KPI’s
•	Implement actions necessary to achieve planned results and continual improvement of value streams and key processes
•	Ensuring QMS tool administration, support and trainings
•	Provide support and assistance to customers and to authorities on aviation safety and quality related matters in collaboration with other internal departments

positionHistory.title: Quality Operations Engineer
positionHistory.description:
▪ Manage MMSI’s Quality clinic - internal and customer non conformities - for the operations and ensure an efficient and robust problem-solving process.
▪ Drive, Improve and Monitor MMSI 5S, ESD and FOD prevention programs, ensuring regular audits and tracking issues for resolution.
▪ Monitor operations adherence to MMSI processes, procedures and report any deviations or findings with proposed corrective actions.
▪ Train new employees on MMSI Quality Concepts and maintain up to date records ensuring regular competence matrix updates. Prepare and provide training on the quality management system and related topics (FOD, ESD, human factors, ...).
▪ Perform initial article inspection (FAI) and maintain an efficient and up to date EN9102 process.
▪ Ensure product inspection and release through configuration final inspection and audit reviews.
▪ Participate and support customers or authorities’ audits (planning and findings follow-up).
▪ Perform internal and external system and product audits as required (including recording audit data, preparing audit reports, ...).
▪ Generate monthly KPI for Operations (OQD, internal and customer NC dashboard, ...).
▪ Help preparing and managing EN/AS9100 recertification and surveillance audits for Mercury International.
▪ Support Mercury UK QMS: prepare and maintain quality management system documentation to ensure compliance to EN/AS9100 requirements for Mercury UK.

positionHistory.title: Supply Chain Quality engineer
positionHistory.description:
* Lead Supplier Quality Clinic / Material Review Board : ensure resolution of Supplier non conformities (8D reports)
* Analyze supplier deficiencies (5M analysis / Pareto)
* Drive supplier evaluations & risk assessments with Supply Chain Team
* Drive supplier improvement actions linked to supplier performance
* Participate to supplier change : work transfer & source change process
* Review Supplier First Article Inspection (FAI) with Industrialization Team
* Monitor and Conduct supplier quality audits and visits (planning and findings follow-up)
* Lead supplier quality part during external audits (customers or 3rd Party organizations)
* Support implementation of APQP (APQP gates and checklists)
* Participate to project reviews as quality lead or transition to Production
* Support Mercury UK QMS : QMS monitoring and quarterly review

* Management of the activity of outsourcing of calibration to external service provider.
* Involved in the deployment of 5S methodology.

positionHistory.description:

positionHistory.title: Ingénieur de recherche

Stage de 3 mois :

> Application : intégration de composants inductifs (bobines, transformateurs) en électronique de puissance.

> Résultats : amélioration des propriétés magnétiques de 2 de ces céramiques par ajout de différents oxydes lors de la synthèse : diminution des pertes magnétiques d'un facteur 3, d'où un gain énergétique.

As a global leader in flooring and movement systems, Forbo Flooring is in many cases an interface with daily life. Our business is about connecting materials, perfecting surfaces and the transport of goods. company.name: Bühler Group
company.tagline: Every day, billions of people use Bühler technologies to satisfy their basic needs for food, mobility, or communication.
company.description:
Billions of people come into contact with Bühler technologies to cover their basic needs for food and mobility every day. For this, we develop the best process solutions along complete value chains and make full use of digitalization, for example with our digital platform Bühler Insights. It monitors, analyzes and adjusts industrial processes to make them more efficient. Digital solutions are the key drivers to reach our targets of reducing energy, waste and water usage in our customers’ value chains by 50% by 2025. 

Two billion people each day enjoy foods produced on Bühler equipment; and one billion people travel in vehicles manufactured with parts produced with our machinery. Having this global relevance, we are in a unique position to turn today’s global challenges into sustainable and good business in close collaboration with customers, academia and start-ups.

person.headline: Supplier Quality Manager (SQM) at Beyond Gravity (former RUAG Space)
person.summary:
Several years of experience in multi-national business environments having worked with TECAN (Medical devices) and SR Technics (Aviation) in Switzerland and Middle East, Lufthansa (Aviation) and DORMAKABA (Industrial and consumer products) in Europe, Pretzel Brothers Corporation in the US (Retail industry). I am a very knowledgeable specialist with a broad experience in business process re-engineering, process management, quality management, procurement and purchasing as well as supply chain and materials management. I am  an entrepreneurial spirited, pragmatic, reliable and passionate person with a track record for driving change and solving complex business problems within different industry sectors as space, medical devices, aviation, life sciences, industrial and consumer goods.

I own a MSc. degree in Business Administration from University of Luneburg and I am a certified European Quality Systems Manager (EOQ), Lead Auditor ISO 9001, Quality internal Auditor (DGQ-QB) and Organizational Trainer (SVEB I). Additionally, I own several Quality Management and Norm related certificates like EN 17025, Value Stream mapping, EN 9110 etc.  

  Specialties: Business Process (Re-)Engineering, Quality Management, Procurement, Supply Chain Management and Logistics.

In my private life I pursue my passion for jewelry and colored gemstones by now also being trained as a gemologist.

recommendationHistory.caption: June 3, 2024, Claudio worked with Nicolas but on different teams
recommendationHistory.description:
Ich habe das Vergnügen, seit 2018 bis heute mit Nicolas bei RUAG Space / RUAG International zusammenzuarbeiten. Ich habe Nicolas als äußerst kompetenten und zuverlässigen Teamplayer kennengelernt. Wir haben gemeinsam ab "Greenfield" die Corporate Real Estate Prozesse aufgesetzt, und er hat mich von Beginn an mit seiner schnellen Auffassungsgabe und seinem ausgeprägten vernetzten Denken überzeugt.

Nicolas verfügt über herausragende Fachkenntnisse im Bereich Prozessmodellierung / Prozessmanagement. Wir haben gemeinsam für das Unternehmen richtungsweisende Erfolge erzielt. Seine Fähigkeit, komplexe Probleme strukturiert und effizient zu lösen, hat unser Team enorm vorangebracht. Auch unter Druck arbeitet er zielgerichtet, ruhig und strukturiert. Seine interpersonellen Kompetenzen sind hervorragend.

Ich kann Nicolas uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen und freue mich auf unsere weitere Zusammenarbeit.

Core competencies:

Achievements/Track records:

2. "Business Continuity Management 2.0": What are the lessons learned from the Corona pandemic for possible future challenges?

company.name: Curaden Global
company.tagline: Better Health For You
company.description:
CURADEN is one of the fastest growing oral care companies. We are inspired to “Think further” and provide  “Better health for you” –- through oral care & education.

We are specialised in training dental professionals and manufacturing over 120 innovative products, which are gentle yet very effective and atraumatic. They are available in more than 90 countries. Dental professionals rely on CURADEN for its all-round service. 

Its oral care brands like CURAPROX, swiss smile, edel+white and megasmile are developed in partnership with expert researchers, teachers and practitioners. Particularly the brand CURAPROX and its oral care education program iTOP enjoy excellent international reputation. In Czech Republic, Brasil, Germany and Slovakia for example, the CS 5460 ultra soft toothrbush reached cult status. 

Founded in 1954 by Hans Breitschmid and taken over by his son Ueli, the company remains a family-owned Swiss company.
Based near Lucerne, CURADEN AG employs 600+ staff across the world. In the last year it generated sales in excess of CHF 150 million and manufactured over 40 million toothbrushes.

Leading of Quality Management Systems, Quality Operations and Regulatory Affairs organizations up to 19 locations within Europe, USA and Asia. 

Strategic, tactical interactions with health authorities and notified bodies around the globe in terms of new product registrations and approvals, Post Market Surveillance and Compliance (Swissmedic, US-FDA, NMPA-China, PMDA, MHLW, ANVISA, HC, TUV, BSi etc.). 

Additional experience in Due Diligence, Merger & Acquisitions and cultural Change Management as well as Talent Management (attract, develop and retain).

positionHistory.title: Director Quality Management, Regulatory & Clinical Affairs and Vigilance
Vice President Quality Management & Regulatory Affairs, Executive Board Member
positionHistory.description:
Implemented strategy for IT based Quality Management System including building up highly qualified, motivated organizations for product registrations, post market surveillance, biocompatibility, sterilization, process validation and supplier auditing allowing for business efficiency, compliance and patient safety.  

Received on time approvals from notified bodies and health authorities regarding recertifications of the entire class III joint replacement portfolio (Shoulder, Hip, Knee) ensuring business continuity and product availability for practitioners and patients.

Established technical documentation according to the new European MDR (Medical Device Regulation), trained and transformed the entire organization including subsidiaries in terms of medical device laws and regulations. 

Audits and inspections which were conducted by notified bodies and health authorities passed successfully and thus increasing reputation and business efficiency.

positionHistory.title: WW Vice President Quality Management Systems DePuySynthes and Quality Operations Synthes
positionHistory.companyLocation: Zuchwil, Switzerland / West Chester PA, USA
positionHistory.description:
Integrated the Synthes Quality Management System into Johnson&Johnson Medical Device & Diagnostic business unit and implemented the enterprise QMS strategy which enabled for an on-time and on-budget transition of the merger.  

Defined and implemented the IT-Quality Management System strategy in alignment with the Johnson&Johnson enterprise and its Medical Device & Diagnostic business unit roadmap resulting in robust and reliable data, improved efficiency and compliance.

Led remediation projects and on-site meetings with the US-FDA. Provided subject matter expert selection and leadership inputs across all project phases, from design through maintenance. Project resulted in solid foundation of the Quality Management System and lower risks and ensured business continuity. 

Led QMS organizations up to 540 employees at 20 different locations in Europe, USA and China with a budget of over 50 Mio USD. Reviewed and approved all Quality Management System capital appropriation requests ensuring budget was met.

positionHistory.title: Vice President Global Quality Management
positionHistory.companyLocation: Waldenburg, Switzerland / West Chester PA, USA
positionHistory.description:
Defined and implemented strategy ensuring regulatory compliance of laws and regulations for medical devices at the sites/locations in Europe, USA and China.  

Established certification audits strategy and provided risk-based approach to a health authority, was approved and resulted in 3.5 Mio. USD cash out savings. 

Merged and harmonized three separate Quality Management Systems USA, Europe and China into one global QM-System. Established corporate objectives and metrics, policies and procedures and ensured implementation at all stages of the enterprise. 

Applied SAP HCM module for training of the entire organization. Leading and developing global QMS organization up to 450 employees at all sites/locations. Incorporated new acquired production sites in Switzerland and China into the global QM-System. 

Leading internal and external audits which were conducted by health authorities and notified bodies. Conducted compliance gap assessments in collaboration with US, Washington based law firm. Assume responsibility for and monitor the allocated annual budget of over 40 Mio USD.

company.description:
𝐅ü𝐡𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐝 𝐢𝐧 𝐝𝐞𝐫 𝐂𝐡𝐫𝐨𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐩𝐡𝐢𝐞-𝐅𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐝-𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐞𝐫𝐮𝐧𝐠

CTC Analytics, ein privates Schweizer Unternehmen. In den letzten 30 Jahren wurden Investitionen in die kontinuierliche Entwicklung einer flexiblen, höchst zuverlässigen und fortschrittlichen Plattform für die Handhabung von Laborproben getätigt. Diese wurden für den Einsatz in der pharmazeutischen, biowissenschaftlichen, chemischen, umwelttechnischen sowie Lebensmittel- und Aromenindustrie konzipiert.

Unsere Produkte sind innovativ, benutzerfreundlich und extrem robust. Ein dichtes Netz hochqualifizierter, effizienter und zuverlässiger Zulieferer ermöglicht eine garantierte Lieferung mit der Verpflichtung zu höchsten Standards und Qualität.

Unsere Roboter-Autosampler-Systeme sind flexibel und modular aufgebaut, so dass unser weltweiter Kundenstamm seine eigene maßgeschneiderte Lösung für seine individuellen Bedürfnisse entwickeln kann. Alle Produkte werden über OEM-Kanäle und ein ausgewähltes Netz unabhängiger CTC-Distributoren in der ganzen Welt vertrieben.

Wir bieten unseren Kunden eine umfassende Unterstützung und Schulung, wobei der Schwerpunkt auf Wissen und praktischer Erfahrung durch lokale Schulungsmöglichkeiten und talentierte Support-Spezialisten liegt.  Als führendes Unternehmen mit einer langfristigen Vision sind wir bestrebt, mit unseren Produkten den größtmöglichen Wert zu schaffen und einen hervorragenden Support zu bieten.


𝐄𝐧𝐠𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐟ü𝐫 𝐐𝐮𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐭ä𝐭

Wir setzen uns für eine dauerhafte Kundenzufriedenheit ein, die auf einer führenden Produktqualität, einer hohen Liefersicherheit und einem reaktionsschnellen Kundensupport beruht.
◾ Unsere Entwicklung und Fertigung umfasst Qualitätskontrollprogramme.
◾ Alle unsere Produkte entsprechen den internationalen Normen wie CE, UL und RoHS.
◾ Unsere Organisation lernt ständig mit dem Ziel, Qualität und Effizienz zu steigern.

recommendationHistory.caption: May 11, 2016, Hans worked with Alexandre on the same team
recommendationHistory.description: I have learned Alex as being a truly asset to the Team as we both worked during a Remediation Project for ZIMMERBiomet. His extreem quick way of thinking and handling sometimes showed to me as a sort of Speedy Gonzales. Always working, creating, discussing in a correct way with the ones being involved, surely showed him as .... having the right awareness and attitude to create (in his case) an improved and outstanding NCR-process, including the needed documents and training for that team. Further his kind personality, sense of humor and extensive knowlegde of both the Quality and Regulatory needs is a true asset to the organizations he is working for.

recommendationHistory.caption: October 10, 2012, Henri worked with Alexandre but on different teams
recommendationHistory.description: Alexandre and I have worked together for many years together at Johnson & Johnson DePuy Trauma/Spine. He is very a proactive person, hands-on attitude, fully engaged with all his work activities, and excellent at collaboration across departments and sites.

recommendationHistory.caption: July 2, 2012, Jon-Paul worked with Alexandre but on different teams
recommendationHistory.description:
My recommendation regarding Alex Rocaries, with whom until just recently, I have worked with for several years in Changzhou China.

Alex working on the regulatory side and myself operations worked well together.  In an environment where each department is at times opposing, Alex was great to work with.  Having the foresight to not only accomplish his goals but also keeping operations goals in front of himself as well.

Besides being a teamplayer, Alex is a take-charge person who is able to commit to daunting tasks with exceptional results.  He has successfully improved scrap rates from 11.8% to 2.9%, FPY from 95% to 99.3% and devoloped a new team while at the same time supporting lead time reductions from 19 days to 4.6 days and VOP increases from $767k to $1,900K. 

Alex was instrumental in taking a young team and instilling dedication, regulatory understanding and quality objectives into their everyday work environment.

Based on my experience of Alex's teamplayer attitude, performance results and people focused skills I would support Alex with my recommendation in his future endeavors.

recommendationHistory.caption: July 1, 2012, Stone worked with Alexandre but on different teams
recommendationHistory.description:
Alex is a colleague that has always been impressing me with his high standard professionalism and good people personality understanding and adaptation. During the past 2 years we have been 
working together, I have been able to witness the progress made at the plant level in terms key process indicators linked to quality in a foreign and high pressure environment. 
What used to be a junior, inexperienced and unsteady department has now become a stable and efficient team that has been able to face up several major compliance challenges while keeping aggressive business growth and improving quality KPI. All successfully achieved simultaneously in a short amount of time. 
Our quality system compliance has gradually improved in order to better meet continuous higher standard linked with business expansion. This reflects a great team work and Alex has definitely been a strong contributor and key player in this achievement. 
I have been enjoying working with Alex and I would recommend him to any organization.

recommendationHistory.caption: June 28, 2012, Nicolas worked with Alexandre on the same team
recommendationHistory.description:
I have been working with Alexandre for several years in Switzerland and China.

This gave me a chance to see and appreciate his professional skills fast expansion. Alex is a quick learner and he can adapt himself to almost any situation and he is definitely a person who likes to face up challenges. He will not be afraid of the difficulty of the task you will assign to him and will always find ways to transform problems into solutions and words into actions, whatever amount of work would be required.

Last but not least, Alexandre can work independently but he is also a natural born leader who has the faculty to federate a team toward an aggressive objective or drastic changes in a smooth way.

To my opinion, Alexandre would be a key asset to any international organization looking for a strong leader

recommendationHistory.caption: June 14, 2012, José worked with Alexandre but on different teams
recommendationHistory.description: Alex is a dynamic and diligent quality assurance and regulatory affairs manager who consistently met the needs and expectations of Biomet 3i even in the most difficult environment for a quality assurance professional. His attention to detail and experience in the production of medical components makes him a key team member. Based on his attitude, experience and expertise Alex would be great asset to any organization.
recommendationHistory.authorFullname: José Colón Freyre, BSME, MBA, CBC

recommendationHistory.caption: June 4, 2012, Wei worked with Alexandre on the same team
recommendationHistory.description: It was a good experience to work with Alexandre in Johnson&Johnson. Alexandre is a colleague with good teamwork, sense of urgency and fair judgement. He's always keeping a high standard in the work, and his rich experience in QS and QE contributed to the company a lot.

recommendationHistory.caption: May 28, 2012, Tianbai worked with Alexandre but on different teams
recommendationHistory.description: Alex is the most passionate colleague I have even worked with. He is always ready to help others and to embrace changes (his Chinese language and his understanding of Chinese culture is the best example, you may never see anyone else from Western countries learn Chinese in such short time).

recommendationHistory.caption: May 24, 2012, Pascal worked with Alexandre but on different teams
recommendationHistory.description: I met Alex when he was working for DePuy Trauma in Switzerland.  I was impressed by his energy and hard work as well as his communication skills.

recommendationHistory.caption: May 18, 2012, Alex worked with Alexandre on the same team
recommendationHistory.description:
Alex has strong QE background and great leadership skills. He has always been strategically thinking. I met firstly Alex in Switzerland when I was assigned there for on-job training. I was impressed by his knowledge and skills in quality control and engineering areas.When I was in JnJ, we cooperated on the World Wide initiatives on Human Error Reduction and Predictive Indicators projects, among critical CAPA's which was very interesting as a learning standpoint. He is really a team player and strong project contributor and demonstrated great leadership skills in a total foreign environnement.
Alex is always willing to accept challenges. Since I met him first, he has extended his responsibilities from QC to QE, QS, and even to regulatory side. He is a versatile person and is fitting into Chinese culture very well.  Within very short time, his Chinese level boomed and he became the best foreign Chinese speaker within JnJ expats. I really admired his achievements. I think Alex has competence for any position for Quality and regulatory. Especially, if the combination of western culture and Chinese culture is important for a company.

recommendationHistory.caption: May 18, 2012, Gary worked with Alexandre but on different teams
recommendationHistory.description:
Alex and I have been known each other for about 4 years since he moved from JNJ Switzerland to JNJ China.
Since his join, the quality atmosphere in this plant has been improved to a new level through his endeavor training, coaching and managing.
He is good at systematic way of thinking, and never got tired answering questions. You can image how hard it to create a quality-first environment for a medical device manufacture located in China.
After that, he joined another major Ortho OEM in East China, facilitated quality leadership across all functional departments.
He is such a nice asset especially today the FDA is raising the bar to QMS requirements.

recommendationHistory.caption: May 16, 2012, John was senior to Alexandre but didn't manage Alexandre directly
recommendationHistory.description:
Alex has demonstrated key Leadership qualities that have led to achieving excellent results at both Johnson & Johnson and Biomet. I first met Alex as an International expat coming from J&J Switzerland to J&J Suzhou China (I was HR Director there). Alex showed his commitment to first adapting to Chinese culture and immersed himself in the language to gain respect among his Chinese peers, with huge success. 

Alex later was hired by a Biomet facility in China as QA Manager and quickly showed his potential and was promoted within months to Senior RC/QA Manager. Alex has brought the Biomet China facilty Quality System to an extremely high and professional level, achieving all compliance requirements and helping set best practice for Biomet.

Alex is a passionate leader, he generates great results through positive motivation of his team and drives for positive high standards from all those around him. I have always found Alex to be highly business and people focussed and a pleasure to work with as an HR business partner. He led teams to deliver on targets and promises with his driving for results style and rational approach. I would strongly reccomend Alex to any Manufacturing organisation looking for a very strong and determined people and Quality/RC leader.

recommendationHistory.caption: May 15, 2012, John worked with Alexandre on the same team
recommendationHistory.description: Alex is the consummate professional. He takes control and makes things happen. Everyone respects him and he treats others with respect.

recommendationHistory.caption: May 15, 2012, Boumediene worked with Alexandre but on different teams
recommendationHistory.description: I had the good fortune to work several years with Alex at JnJ, his enthusiasm and his dynamism have a positive impact on people working with him. His Energy as well as his motivation are an asset to hit an aggressive target such as launching new products on time.

recommendationHistory.caption: May 14, 2012, Liu worked with Alexandre on the same team
recommendationHistory.description: Alex worked hard with strategical thinking, he led the QE team to reduce the product scrap or rework rate that was very helpful and impressive. He is friendly and help others all the time. It had been a good time working with him.

recommendationHistory.caption: May 14, 2012, Jessie worked with Alexandre on the same team
recommendationHistory.description: Well communication shill, warm hearted, work with passion.

recommendationHistory.caption: May 14, 2012, Justin worked with Alexandre on the same team
recommendationHistory.description: Alex is an extremely professional and forward thinking Leader with lots of potential for further growth. He is currently the Senior Manager for RC and QA and leads a diverse team within Biomet, he has some very good manufacturing experience. Alex is ideal for foreign owned companies looking for a senior level leader who can bring the best of Chinese and Western culture together and help to grow a strong and loyal leadership team around him. I would recommend Alex’s professionalism to achieve positive outcomes for such an important role of Senior Manager for RC and QA in China, or anywhere in the world.

person.headline: Senior Quality System Specialist
person.summary:
My name is Dorottya, I am a multi-specialized professional, with more than 10 years’ experience in food industry, consulting firms and as a freelancer.
I have a proven experience with:  Quality assurance, Quality Compliance, Regulatory Compliance, Risk Analysis, Food Labeling, Food/Healthcare Regulations, QMS, GxP, Process Improvement and Project management. 

Regardless of whether I am an employee or a freelancer, my top priority is to identify unmet needs and challenges then to propose meaningful customer-centric solutions.

I am honest, proactive, hard-working, resilient, curious, and like to meet and collaborate with people with diverse backgrounds.
Fluent in English, French and Hungarian (and learning German).

When I’m not on the job, I love hiking with my family and indulging my love for seeing new places.

If you’d like to learn more about how my skills can help your company, please reach out via email (dokarako@yahoo.fr).

- Coordinating of organic coffee roadmap deployment with different stakeholders and ensuring factories organic certification maintenance and roll-out to new markets. 
- Reinforcing internal quality compliance through various initiatives and processes.
- Conducting Internal audits as lead auditor*.
- Ensuring factories inspection readiness for both Sustainability (Rain Forest, Fair Trade) and Religious (Halal, Kosher) certification audits, including audit preparation, hosting and remediation management.
- Supporting contaminants' residues management.
- Supporting Recycled Aluminum Program management.
- Ensuring Quality standards lifecycle management.
- Being the key contact of certification bodies.

* Qualified Auditor by Lloyds Register - LRQA

company.name: Varian
company.tagline: At Varian, a Siemens Healthineers company, we envision a world without fear of cancer.
company.description:
At Varian, a Siemens Healthineers company, we envision a world without fear of cancer. For more than 75 years, Varian has developed, built, and delivered innovative technologies and solutions that help care providers around the globe treat millions of patients each year. Today, as a Siemens Healthineers company, we support every step of the cancer care journey – from screening to survivorship. From advanced imaging and radiation therapy, to comprehensive software and services, to interventional radiology, we are harnessing the power of our perspective while also pursuing clinical research to create a more efficient, and more personalized care pathway. Because, for cancer patients everywhere, their fight is our fight.

recommendationHistory.caption: October 18, 2022, Adrian was Angelina’s client
recommendationHistory.description:
It was and is always a pleasure to work with Angelina and her team. She is a great auditor and expert in the field of medical devices. 
I can recommend Angelina and her team without any reservation.

recommendationHistory.caption: February 15, 2021, Pascal was Angelina’s client
recommendationHistory.description: The team of Qunique has supported us competently on the way to ISO 13485 certification. Thanks for everything

recommendationHistory.caption: August 18, 2020, Benjamin was Angelina’s client
recommendationHistory.description:
It was a great opportunity to work with Qunique. A very professional, properly executed and relevant mock audit under combined scope MDR 2017/745 and ISO 13485:2016. 

Many thanks to Angelina, Aynur and Basil ! So much improvements and hints within effective timeline. 

Eventually, even with a mask all the day long, we kept our smile and great mindset.

recommendationHistory.caption: April 16, 2020, Daniel was Angelina’s client
recommendationHistory.description:
Angelina is an excellent expert in the field of medical devices in terms of quality and regulatory requirements.
She is a great speaker, mentor and open-minded, friendly person with extensive knowledge in her specialization. 
I have been working with Angelina and her team on the implementation of MDR. Highly motivated team, very professional! 
Her expertise and exact up to date overview of the complex structure of the MDR as well as her natural empathy and great communication skills make her a great guide for companies undertaking the complex way in the implementation of MDR requirements.
It is a pleasure to have Angelina engaged and to work with.

recommendationHistory.caption: April 15, 2020, Steven was Angelina’s client
recommendationHistory.description:
Qunique have offered invaluable support and guidance to me and my QA team as we readied ourselves for MDR and IVDR compliance.
The team offers a professional and personal touch that provides a reassuring and pragmatic approach to problems and truly delivers as a solutions provider.
I also had opportunity to attend a Qunique run seminar on PRRC and was impressed by the presenters and level of discussions.
Angelina and the team are a great bunch of people, I wish them well and can recommend them as true experts in their field.

recommendationHistory.caption: April 6, 2020, Julie worked with Angelina but they were at different companies
recommendationHistory.description: I recently had the privilege of working with Angelina on the audit of our clinical affairs files. Her expertise in 14155 really helped us understand areas of improvement with her well guided recommendations.  I would definitely work with her again, she’s very approachable and professional.

recommendationHistory.caption: April 2, 2020, Isabella worked with Angelina but they were at different companies
recommendationHistory.description:
For any QA/RA professional considering working with Angelina and her team at Qunique, I could not recommend it more. 

As a consultant who has collaborated with several other agencies as well as worked with many direct clients, I can say this experience provides the best of both worlds. 

As a senior consultant, I appreciate the trust shown to me in the degree of freedom that I have to organize my work and interact directly with the client. However, I also feel highly supported any time I have a doubt, or I need to gain more information about a certain topic. Angelina and her team are very knowledgeable and quick to respond. 

I also considered highly valuable that Angelina always checks with me first before assigning a new client or project. She then handles the contractual negotiation and takes on the financial risk of nonpaying/ late paying clients. That’s so much stress lifted off my chest! 

If what I wrote above was not enough, on a personal level Angelina is also a very kind and thoughtful person who puts a lot of passion in her work and is fun to be around.

recommendationHistory.caption: March 30, 2020, Annamaria was Angelina’s client
recommendationHistory.description:
Angelina audited one of my processes, to verify that the recent Kaizen event's outcomes did not have a negative impact on the compliance. She conducted a very thorough audit, going deep into the details and following up on every loose end.
During the extremely professional and exhausting remote audit she remained friendly the whole time. She has proven to have a very deep knowledge of the standard and an extensive experience on the industry practice. She is an expert with great auditor skills and I recommend her for remote as well as onsite audits without reservation.

recommendationHistory.caption: November 28, 2019, Rossita was Angelina’s client
recommendationHistory.description:
I have been working with Angelina and her team on the implementation of MDR/IVDR in a complex organizational environment. Highly motivated team, very professional and diligent! 
Thank you very much for the REAL help, for the inspiring discussions and the fantastic collaboration. Looking forward to further projects!

recommendationHistory.caption: May 22, 2019, Sandra was Angelina’s client
recommendationHistory.description:
Angelina is an excellent expert in the field of medical devices in terms of quality and regulatory requirements.
She is a great speaker, mentor and open-minded, friendly person with extensive knowledge in her specialization. Her expertise and exact uptodate overview of the complex structure of the MDR as well as her natural empathy and great communication skills  make her a great guide for companies undertaking the complex way in the implementation of MDR requirements.
It was a pleasure to have Angelina engaged and to work with.

recommendationHistory.caption: February 12, 2019, Andreas was Angelina’s client
recommendationHistory.description: I know Angelina for a year now and we have finally had our first joint seminar event at Qunique's facilities in Wohlen, CH. During all phases of the preparation and execution of the event Angelina has shown very high professionalism and engagement to provide a first-class seminar for clients. This touches not only on seminar contents but also on organizational aspects and the facility. I am really looking forward to our next joint project, Angelina.

recommendationHistory.caption: April 27, 2018, Chris worked with Angelina on the same team
recommendationHistory.description: Angelina ist die Superfrau aus dem Bilderbuch! Schwierige und komplizierte Angelegenheiten meistert Sie mühelos. Durchsetzung ist Ihr Markenzeichen! Was von Ihr anvisiert wird, ist bald eine erfolgreich gemeisterte Stufe auf Ihrem Weg. Wenn es eine Person gibt, die alles erreicht, was Sie will, dann ist es Angelina! Wir freuen uns auf viele weitere gemeinsame und erfolgreiche Projekte mit Ihr. Mit Ihr bleibt es immer spannend!

recommendationHistory.caption: January 9, 2018, Oliver Richard was Angelina’s client
recommendationHistory.description: I experienced Angelina recently as a highly skilled and experienced tutor for an Inhouse training for MDSAP. Angelina understands very well to motivate and to connect with people. Our delegates benefited from her wide experience in the medical devices business. I would absolutely recommend Angelina when it comes to any future similar requests. Oliver Schaer, BSI Group

recommendationHistory.caption: December 27, 2017, Martina was Angelina’s client
recommendationHistory.description: I had the pleasure of working with Angelina Hakim during the preparation to our first MDSAP audit when we hired her as an in-house trainer for a two days course. Angelina introduced the challenges and special issues of an MDSAP audit and incorporated many team oriented tasks into her course. Our ten participants all enjoyed working with Angelina. She is very knowledgeable and went the extra mile to answer literally all emerging questions during this training. We enjoyed Angelina’s friendly and cooperative personality and would always hire her again. I can truly recommend Angelina as a trainer and am looking forward to future projects with her.

recommendationHistory.caption: October 24, 2017, Carsten worked with Angelina on the same team
recommendationHistory.description:
Collaborating with Angelina at Straumann was a true pleasure. Her positive mindset, her ability to put herself in the stakeholder shoes and her will to bring the company forward was impressive and inspiring.
She has a great power of comprehension and is able to explain and break down complex tasks into understandable and digestable pieces. 
Her open minded and open hearted personality makes it easy for her to get connected and quickly built trustfull and persistent relationships.  
Her technical skills combined with her broad experience and outstanding character makes her an asset for every team, company or client. I would not hesitate to start a collaboration with her as I know from the very beginning that she is a true overachiever!

recommendationHistory.caption: October 13, 2017, Toni Kennet was senior to Angelina but didn't manage Angelina directly
recommendationHistory.description:
Angelina was part of a very important project at Straumann, called Project ABC, the misty important part of this project was Project Compliance, where Angelina provided excellent support to improve and make our document in compliance to the several international requirements that Straumann was obliged to comply to.
Angelina has a rare skill to motivate the people around her to deliver to their best, resulting in that things get done to the best ability of the company, she shows great leadership. She brings positive energy to the table, resulting in a great team spirit and it´s with pleasure I see how see now share her gained experience with other colleagues in the industry.

recommendationHistory.caption: September 30, 2017, Gianluca managed Angelina directly
recommendationHistory.description:
It's a pleasure for me to write this recommendation for Angelina Hakim.
Angelina worked as Head of Program Management/Head of Product Compliance and Process Improvement under my supervision for 3 years. She has been an invaluable source of information and a solid performer within the R&D organization (and also directly leading inter-department projects).
Angelina owns the rare skill of multi-disciplinary backgrounds, excellent in both technical and regulatory domains. Her best gift is the natural leadership, with a clear teamwork approach, and a strong personal motivation to reach consensus across multi-department teams, even in a less than cooperative scenario.
Angelina was not only an asset for our organization because of her skills and extended hard work, she also was a great reference and support for processes/regulatory directions. Over the years, she successfully managed a number of projects in a global organization, interacting with multi-facility environments.
Other noticeable Angelina's skills were a solid multi-tasking capability, and a natural gift in creating motivation and focus across the different teams.
Finally, Angelina is the kind of person that is capable to build-up, both in process management and in loyalty/personal relationship. Her attitude is to help, and contribute to change the classical problem into the classical opportunity. I liked that a lot.
Certainly working with Angelina has been very profitable, but also - as a thorough professional - truly pleasurable. I truly recommend her for any management position that she'll intend to pursue in the future, and wish her best of luck in all her endeavors.
Please feel free to contact me in case you need information regarding Angelina's professional profile.

recommendationHistory.caption: September 26, 2017, Chantal was Angelina’s client
recommendationHistory.description: An absolute sympathic person who is engaged to create exclusive seminars and bring interesting knowhow to people

recommendationHistory.caption: September 12, 2017, Martina worked with Angelina but on different teams
recommendationHistory.description: Angelina is a very reliable, open minded and hard working individual, who doesn't forget smiling even under difficult circumstances. She always has an open ear for colleagues and a problem solving talent. Working with Angelina is a privilege. She's working with a can do approach and willing to go the extra mile. She's an asset for every Company. I would be glad to work with Angelina again in the future.

recommendationHistory.caption: September 11, 2017, Jane worked with Angelina but on different teams
recommendationHistory.description:
In meiner damaligen Position als Head of Reception Desk bei der Firma Straumann, habe ich Angelina als sehr kompetent, einsatzfreudig und zielstrebig erlebt. 
Ihre Ausstrahlung, ihre freundliche und zuvorkommende Umgang mit Kolleginnen und Kollegen bleiben mir in guter Erinnerung.
Ich bin überzeugt, dass sie mit diesen Eigenschaften mit QUNIQUE einer erfolgreichen Zukunft entgegenschaut.

My name is Dorottya, I am a multi-specialized professional, with more than 10 years’ experience in food industry, consulting firms and as a freelancer.
I have a proven experience with:  Quality assurance, Quality Compliance, Regulatory Compliance, Risk Analysis, Food Labeling, Food/Healthcare Regulations, QMS, GxP, Process Improvement and Project management. 

Regardless of whether I am an employee or a freelancer, my top priority is to identify unmet needs and challenges then to propose meaningful customer-centric solutions.

I am honest, proactive, hard-working, resilient, curious, and like to meet and collaborate with people with diverse backgrounds.
Fluent in English, French and Hungarian (and learning German).

When I’m not on the job, I love hiking with my family and indulging my love for seeing new places.

If you’d like to learn more about how my skills can help your company, please reach out via email (dokarako@yahoo.fr).

person.headline: Head of Global Quality Management | Master of Engineering (M.Eng.)

positionHistory.title: Head of Global Quality Management
positionHistory.description:
• Define and introduce global standards for quality-preserving and quality-improving strategies, goals, processes, and structures
• Supervisory leadership of an employee in sustainability management; technical leadership of ten local quality managers and their departments/teams (a total of 60 employees) across the global production plants
• Lead and further develop global quality and sustainability management, ensuring the implementation of corporate policy, strategy, and roadmap worldwide
• Develop and implement a comprehensive global quality management system from scratch
• Conceptualize and implement a global management system, including system certifications (ISO 9001, ISO 13485, ISO 14001, ISO 22163, ISO 45001, ISO 50001, IATF 16949)
• Define and ensure reporting for standardized global KPIs (product group, material group, and location-based)
• Conduct risk analyses, determine risk strategies, and ensure the implementation of appropriate measures to mitigate company-related risks
• Monitor sustainability reporting and ensure compliance with relevant frameworks, standards, and disclosure requirements
• Analyze, adapt, and improve existing systems, as well as product and process quality, and areas related to environmental protection and sustainability
• Coordinate, manage, and execute external and internal audits and projects, including driving digitization in quality process tools and the use of AI technologies
• Coordinate local and international sustainability projects
• Develop a comprehensive sustainability management system and a climate roadmap
• Develop strategic and operational sustainability goals
• Implement global and local measures to improve all areas of sustainability

positionHistory.title: Head of Quality
positionHistory.description:
• Management of the quality with technical leadership of the employees
• Ensured operational quality assurance from goods receipt to product testing in accordance with the product standards and customer requirements
• Maintenance and further development of the integrated management system in accordance with ISO 9001:2015, ISO 14001:2015 and ISO 45001:2018 standards as well as evaluation of information on quality-relevant data for development of concepts for quality improvement
• Monitored customer and supplier complaints as well as risk management according to ISO 31000:2018
• Ensured QM verification documentation including review and approval of relevant documents as well as development of quality-relevant guidelines for strategic alignment
• Project management of comprehensive projects (global transfer, implementation, harmonization and synchronization of guidelines as well as quality excellence)
• Led quality circles as well as the international task force in escalated quality issues
• Planned and executed global audits and production releases as well as coordination during the localization and relocation of core components

• Assisted in monitoring and analyzing defect costs in production areas and tracked countermeasures
• Regularly reported relevant key performance indicators, coordinated, and analyzed quality data and established measures to management
• Prepared and conducted escalation meetings

• Collaborated in the project team for the site's certification according to IATF 16949

• Ensured compliance with all relevant safety standards and legal regulations

educationHistory.description:

company.name: Möbel Pfister AG
company.tagline: Mit Leidenschaft fürs Einrichten geben wir alles, damit in jedem Zuhause Produkte von Pfister stehen.
company.description:
Wir pflegen einen partnerschaftlichen Umgang, haben Mut zur Veränderung und eine klare Vision: Mit Leidenschaft fürs Einrichten geben wir alles, damit in jedem Zuhause Produkte von Pfister stehen.

Wir nehmen unsere gesellschaftliche Verantwortung wahr, indem wir den Menschen und die Natur in all unseren Tätigkeiten achten. Wir sind stolze Botschafterinnen und Botschafter von Pfister, die mit ihrer Begeisterung und Passion fürs Einrichten Aussergewöhnliches leisten.

Wir schaffen Freiräume, um eigene Ideen zu entwickeln und diese auch in die Tat umzusetzen. Unser Leitgedanke ist, dass wir Veränderungen als Chance verstehen. Passieren uns Fehler, lernen wir daraus. Unser Umgang ist respektvoll und von Anerkennung und Vertrauen geprägt. Ob Kundinnen und Kunden oder Mitarbeitende: Unser Ziel ist es, dass sich immer mehr Menschen für Pfister entscheiden. 

Auch die Verantwortung gegenüber der Gesellschaft prägt unsere Unternehmenskultur. Seit über 30 Jahren bieten wir psychisch erkrankten Menschen auf ihre Bedürfnisse zugeschnittene, beschützende Arbeitsplätze in verschiedenen Bereichen des Unternehmens.

Ökologisches Bewusstsein und eine würdevolle Tierhaltung liegen uns am Herzen. Deshalb wächst unser Sortiment von ökologisch nachhaltigen Produkten stetig. 
Mit den Cradle to Cradle® Produkten sind wir mit unseren Bemühungen in diesem Bereich einen grossen Schritt weitergekommen. Denn Cradle to Cradle® zertifizierte Produkte können nach Gebrauch rückstandslos in den natürlichen Kreislauf zurückgeführt werden. 2017 lancierte Pfister die ersten «kompostierbaren» Vorhänge – weltweit! Mittlerweile wurde die Cradle to Cradle® Kollektion um Frotteewäsche und Bettwäsche ergänzt, weitere Produkte sind in Planung. 
Seit August 2017 sind alle unsere Artikel, die Federn/Daunen beinhalten, mit dem DOWNPASS-Label ausgezeichnet. Unsere Bett-Textilien sind fast ausnahmslos nach dem Öko-Tex ® Standard 100 zertifiziert.

company.name: Bucher Unipektin AG
company.description:
We are your competent partner and supplier for single units as well as complete lines for the solid-liquid separation, filtration, juice treatment and concentrate production. These beverage technologies are mainly used for the pro-duction of fruit juices and purées as well as in beer filtration. But also for vegetable and citrus juices, flavors and plant extract recovery within the pharmaceutical industry we offer solutions. Further we design and construct industrial vacuum and freeze dryers (lyophilisation). These are, among other fields, used for the production of instant-soups and -beverages.

Another business area is environmental technology, where we achieve successful results in sewage sludge and industrial sludge dewatering as well as in the solid-liquid separation of drinking water treatment plants. 

First class products and services form the base of our market leading position. We operate with high motivation and flexibility with our customers, based on defined needs as well as new market-trends innovative solutions and products are developed. Thereby ecological aspects are respected. 

Our business unit is operating globally. Own sales- and service-organisations in Switzerland, Austria, Poland, Russia, New Zealand and China all most competent and quick assistance of our clients.

company.name: SQS - Swiss Association for Quality and Management Systems
company.tagline: Accredited SQS-certifications – Quality that counts!
company.description:
The Swiss Association for Quality and Management Systems (SQS) is Switzerland's leading organisation for certification and assessment services. It was founded in 1983 as one of the world's first companies in this industry. Today, SQS operates internationally and has over 150 permanent employees in Switzerland, France and Italy and more than 250 freelancers around the world.

Constituted as a Swiss association, SQS is a neutral and independent not for profit-organisation, which is guided by the values of credibility, honesty and incorruptibility. Its already has 65 members from Swiss business associations and federal agencies that support the concept of high-quality certification procedures. New members are welcome.

SQS certifications are recognised worldwide and are synonymous with high quality. This is guaranteed through accreditation by the Swiss Accreditation Service (SAS), membership of the IQNet international certification network and various cooperation agreements and arrangements with recognised partners.

Mission
With auditing, assessment, certification and training, we make an important contribution to our customers’ sustainable success.

Vision
SQS is perceived in the market as a premium partner for management systems that offer comprehensive quality and sustainable success.
specialities: Sicherheit und Gesundheit bei der Arbeit

Sept. 1996 to Dec. 2000 as Safety Officer :

Jan. 2001 to Dec. 2001 as Corporate Security, Safety & Environment Protection Manager : 
Set global EHS strategy and construction safety guideline worldwide (12 manufacturing sites and R&D centers), ensure sites compliance with company and mandatory requirements, lead global EHS KPIs and report.

As a data-driven and forward-thinking leader with a passion for learning about new industries, I excel at driving change and achieving results through my strategic thinking and entrepreneurial spirit. My expertise allows me to help organizations achieve their goals and create financial benefits, acquire customers, and improve overall business operations. I am skilled at managing complex projects and programs, reducing costs, and increasing value and performance.

I have a strong belief in teamwork and an inclusive management style, and I am dedicated to developing my staff to help them reach their full potential. With my analytical mindset and scientific approach, I am able to identify opportunities for improvement and initiate cross-functional projects that impact the business, regardless of function or industry.

I am constantly seeking out opportunities to make a positive impact, and I believe that growth requires a global perspective. I am always looking for new technologies, business models, and analytics that can help make things easier, faster, and more reliable. I believe that the combination of data science and AI with operational and business excellence has tremendous untapped potential.


What I'm good at:
“Complex critical thinking, Social Intelligence, Creative problem solving”

                                                                                  Be Brave. Take Risks. Nothing can substitute experience.

company.name: Bystronic Group
company.tagline: Bystronic is a leading global provider of high-quality solutions for the sheet metal processing business.
company.description:
Bystronic is a globally leading technology company in the area of sheet metal processing. Our high-quality solutions enable transformation into a productive and sustainable future. The focus is on the automation of the complete material and data flow of the cutting and bending process chain. The intelligent connectivity of our laser cutting systems and pressbrakes with innovative automation, software, and service solutions is the key to comprehensive digitalization in the sheet metal industry. 

Our company headquarters are located in Niederönz, Switzerland. Additional development and production locations are in Sulgen (Switzerland), Gotha (Germany), Cazzago San Martino and San Giuliano Milanese (Italy), Tianjin and Shenzhen (China), and Hoffman Estates (USA). We are actively represented by our own sales and service subsidiaries in more than 30 countries and by agents in numerous other countries.

We stand for customer proximity, high-performance innovations, service excellence, and local expertise. As a trusted partner, we aim for long-term collaboration to solidify lasting customer relationships.

Bystronic. Your best choice.

positionHistory.title: Head Group APS and PC&L
positionHistory.description:
Global responsibility for APS (Autoneum Production System) and PC&L (Production Control and Logistics).

Primary goals:
1. Develop a best-in-class lean manufacturing mindset throughout the organization.
2. Define and deploy APS and PC&L standard processes.
3. Ensure the plants strive towards operational excellence and continuously improve quality, cost, delivery and inventory.

• Established mid-term strategic roadmap for Autoneum Production System (APS) and Production Control and Logistics (PC&L).
• Conducted Hoshin, Problem Solving, Pull System and Value Stream Mapping workshops on site.
• Developed and launched a global training concept (awareness, expert / train the trainer, onboarding...).
• Conducted plant maturity assessments (internal lean audits).
• Managed APS and PC&L networks (leading monthly exchanges with the local and regional experts to share best practices).
• Acted as PC&L Process Owner: responsible for the approval of PC&L change requests for all systems.
• Deployed a Kaizen Award program within the organization.

positionHistory.title: Lean Manufacturing Specialist
positionHistory.description:
Responsible to support the worldwide operations (52 manufacturing sites) in implementing lean manufacturing best practices through the Autoneum Production System (APS).

Primary goals:
1. Create, manage and promote the Autoneum lean tools and standards across the plants.
2. Lead improvement workshops on site.
3. Train and coach the APS network.

• Supported the plants in the application of the Autoneum Production System (APS) standards and tools.
• Developed and conducted lean training program to the plant lean experts.
• Performed lean assessments globally.
• Organized and executed lean workshops including Kaizen, Problem Solving, Productivity Improvement, Value Stream Mapping...
• Coordinated the global APS network.
• Administrated group platforms including the key performance indicator (KPI) reporting tool.

person.headline:
Master of Business Administration (Choice Overload)
Senior Prozess Manager (Strategic Direction)
Industriemeister (Internal business processes)
person.summary:
Als erfahrener Prozessmanager und Betriebsleiter verfüge ich über mehr als 14 Jahre Erfahrung in den Bereichen Prozessoptimierung, Qualitätsmanagement und Betriebsführung. Geboren am 29. Dezember 1983, habe ich eine Leidenschaft für kontinuierliche Verbesserung und Innovation, die sich in meiner Karriere widerspiegelt.

Meine berufliche Laufbahn begann als Mechaniker und Betriebsleiter im Bereich der industriellen Produktion, wo ich mein technisches Geschick und meine Führungsfähigkeiten unter Beweis stellte. Im Laufe der Jahre habe ich meine Fähigkeiten durch eine Vielzahl von Herausforderungen erweitert und verfeinert, darunter die Leitung von Prozessoptimierungsprojekten mit erheblichen Kosteneinsparungen und Produktionssteigerungen.

Mein Studium MBA an der Universität Wien und der Middlesex University London sowie meine Ausbildung zum Senior Process Manager haben meine Qualifikationen in den Bereichen Betriebsführung und Prozessmanagement weiter gestärkt. Ich bin ein routinierter Anwender von MS Office, SAP und anderen relevanten Softwareprogrammen und verfüge über ausgezeichnete Kommunikations- und Führungsfähigkeiten.

Ich habe erfolgreich Teams geleitet und komplexe Projekte im Bereich der Prozessoptimierung und Qualitätssicherung umgesetzt. Meine Erfolge in der Implementierung von Qualitätsmanagementsystemen und der Gewährleistung von Compliance-Standards haben zu messbaren Verbesserungen in der Produktivität und Effizienz geführt.

In meiner Freizeit genieße ich es, Zeit mit meiner Familie zu verbringen und meinen Hobbys wie Astronomie, Gärtnern und Fitness nachzugehen. Ich bin motiviert, kontinuierlich zu lernen und mich weiterzuentwickeln, und freue mich darauf, meine Erfahrungen und Fähigkeiten in einem neuen herausfordernden Umfeld einzubringen.

educationHistory.degreeName: Master of Business Administration - MBA, Business, Management, Marketing und verbundene unterstützende Dienste
educationHistory.fieldOfStudy: Master of Business Administration - MBA, Business, Management, Marketing und verbundene unterstützende Dienste
educationHistory.description: Mein Fachgebiet umfasst das General Management mit Schwerpunkten in Personalentwicklung, Firmenentwicklung, Industrie 4.0, Change-Management und Risikomanagement sowie internationalen Marketinganalysen.

Das Zertifikat zum "Senior Process Manager (SPcM)" mit mehrjähriger Tätigkeit im Bereich des Processmanagements und großer Erfahrung in der Prozessgestaltung, Einführung und Prozessoptimierung.
Meine Expertise erstreckt sich über den gesamten Prozesslebenszyklus, Prozessmanagementprojekte, Konflikt- und Veränderungsmanagement sowie Aspekte der Organisationsentwicklung und Unternehmenssteuerung. Zusätzlich beherrsche ich verschiedene Methoden des Prozessmanagements wie Six Sigma, KVP (Kontinuierlicher Verbesserungsprozess), BSC (Balanced Scorecard) und Business Process Reengineering. Ich bin vertraut mit Bewertungsmodellen für Prozessmanagement wie EN ISO 15504:2004, Assessments, Audits.

Zu diesen Aufgabenbereichen gehören die Koordination der reibungslosen Abläufe in der Produktion und die Sicherstellung von Qualitätsstandards der Produkte. Zusätzlich umfasst sein Verantwortungsbereich den Arbeitsschutz und die Unfallverhütung.

Meine Kompetenzen umfassen Betriebstechnik, Fertigungstechnik, Montagetechnik, Organisation, betriebliches Kostenwesen, Planungs-, Steuerungs- und Kommunikationssysteme, Arbeits-, Umwelt- und Gesundheitsschutz, Führung und Personalwesen sowie Personalentwicklung und Qualitätsmanagement.

company.name: Netstal
company.tagline: We maximize your production efficiency. With Netstal's leading injection molding technology.
company.description:
Cultivating values, creating value

Netstal stands for globally leading high-performance injection molding technology. The Netstal brand goes back to our founding site of the same name in the canton of Glarus, Switzerland. We employ over 500 people at our headquarters with production plant in Näfels and in our subsidiaries.

We offer manufacturing companies in the packaging industry, beverage industry and medical technology high-performance machines which work extremely efficiently, with absolute precision and maximum reliability. We are continuously developing these solutions and deliberately incorporating innovative technologies. Because we feel jointly responsible for ensuring that our customers produce efficiently and sustainably. That is why we are driving the development of digitalization and the circular economy with our expertise and experience. We have focused our portfolio on performance, precision, and quality. Customers can find Elios and Elion series injection molding machines with clamping forces between 800 and 10,000 kN, the PET-Line preform system for up to 144 cavities, and turnkey system solutions from a single source. Our quality management is certified according to ISO 9001 and our accredited calibration laboratory meets the requirements of ISO/IEC 17025:2017.

Netstal became part of the Krones Group in 2024.

company.name: CASALE
company.tagline: Plants for a new Planet. Since 1921.
company.description:
Casale is a global provider of integrated solutions for the production of fertilizers and other base chemicals. Leveraging on its comprehensive technology portfolio, Casale is among the few licensors that can provide the entire production chain of nitrogenous and phosphate fertilizers (Ammonia, Urea, Nitric Acid, Nitrates, and Phosphates), as well as Melamine, Methanol, and Syngas. The portfolio also includes sustainable technologies aimed at reducing the carbon footprint in the synthesis of chemicals, such as green/blue ammonia, methanol, and hydrogen production, 
 Casale delivers, both for plant retrofits (revamping) and new plants, a comprehensive range of services and products including:

•	equipment and materials supply
•	EP/EPC project contracting 
•	digital solutions for plant control and management
•	repair and maintenance services
Casale has more than 400 employees and is a privately owned Swiss Company, with headquarters in Lugano (Switzerland) and a network of representative offices and agents all over the world.

company.name: RONAL GROUP
company.description:
«Great Passion for Great Wheels»

With its headquarters in Härkingen (Switzerland), the RONAL GROUP is one of the world's leading manufacturers of alloy wheels for cars and commercial vehicles. The company is active on both the OEM and aftermarket for cars and commercial vehicles. 
 
Each year, the RONAL GROUP is capable of producing more than 19 million wheels in its 13 plants located across three continents. We carry out all production steps ourselves, from the design to tool making and the final product. Thanks to 50 years of know-how in wheel manufacturing, our customers include all renowned automotive manufacturers worldwide. 

In addition, under our own brand RONAL, we market an extensive range of aluminum wheels for the aftermarket. With the SPEEDLINE TRUCK brand, the Group also has a range of products for commercial vehicles, trailers and touring coaches, in both original equipment and aftermarket production. 

Around 6,500 employees currently work for the RONAL GROUP at several subsidiaries around the globe, in administration and production. Furthermore, the RONAL GROUP manufactures its own tools at two sites and has in RONLOG a central logistic center for its products. In our new RONAL TECHNOLOGIE GmbH innovation center, new technologies, materials and products of tomorrow are researched; solutions are developed with which the RONAL GROUP will be able to contribute towards shaping the mobility of the future.

In addition to keeping an eye on economic growth, the RONAL GROUP has for years been focusing on its responsibility for future generations with its PLANBLUE concept. We have set ourselves ambitious targets in the fields of "Our Business," "Our World" and "Our People." These concern the topics of "Sustainable and innovative products," "Energy and climate," and "Employee development, occupational safety and health." 

RONAL GROUP also manufactures shower trays and enclosures under the RONAL Bathrooms brand.

recommendationHistory.caption: May 28, 2024, Régis was senior to John but didn't manage John directly
recommendationHistory.description:
John is a very dynamic Leader with a proven track record in supply chain optimization, negotiation, and cost savings. 
His experience at ABB and contributions to businessexcellence.eu demonstrate his strategic vision and operational excellence. 
John’s consistent excellence over many years positions them as an invaluable asset for any international interim project.

recommendationHistory.caption: October 18, 2022, Shrikant reported directly to John
recommendationHistory.description:
I know John since 2014 when he was at ABB's corporate office at Zurich. John has spearheaded ABB's strategic initiatives on operational excellence & quality management. 

He has launched the CEO Excellence Award globally in all ABB plants to recognize outstanding achievements accomplished through the talent, passion and drive of the employees around the world. He was instrumental in ensuring through this awards that employees remain motivated for process improvement across the value chain. 

He has consistently contributed towards ABB's accomplishment of its most important KPI's such as customer satisfaction, OnTime Delivery/On-Quality Delivery, cost reduction and sustainability.  I wish John all the very best for his future endeavours.

recommendationHistory.caption: October 18, 2022, Martin worked with John on the same team
recommendationHistory.description: John and myself have been colleagues at ABB Group and now again at the businessexcellence.eu team. John has over 20 years’ experience helping Fortune Global 500 companies develop and execute operational excellence, supply chain and quality strategies that drive growth. John is committed to help companies to improve operational and financial performance and increase competitive advantage. I appreciate him as an open, understanding employee with a natural demeanor who demonstrates a deep appreciation of other views and cultures. He is always open to feedback and deals with it constructively. He is a good listener and was capable of adopting a different perspective and presenting objective arguments. It is a pleasure to work with John, any organization or team would be lucky to have him on board.

recommendationHistory.caption: October 4, 2019, Jens worked with John but on different teams
recommendationHistory.description: John is a great and reliable person to work with. He is a proactive problem solver, a strong program leader, an excellent organizer, and a swift analyst! He also has long years of experience with international, multicultural, cross-divisional and global teams. I would definitely recommend him because he adds significant value to the team.

recommendationHistory.caption: July 14, 2018, Rahul worked with John on the same team
recommendationHistory.description: John and I have been colleague for 5 years. I have known him to be very sincere and dedicated employee with specialist knowledge in operational excellence. He has built excellent maturity assements, processes and tools to support identifying and fixing operational excellence gaps through the Lean methodology both within the factories and extended supplier base. It has been a pleasure working with him and I wish him all the best in his future endeavors.

recommendationHistory.caption: June 11, 2018, John was senior to Haitham but didn't manage Haitham directly
recommendationHistory.description:
In all my years of experience, some people stand out for their great qualities and “Mr. John Mueller” is one of those people. It was quite remarkable that He has a unique guidance, coaching style, and a motivation leadership, which helped me a lot to be awarded with the ABB CEO Excellence Gold and Silver awards.
I’m heartily thanking him for all t!he time he spent to train, and coach me during the journey of the ABB CEO Excellence program.
I thank you Mr. John, and wish you all the best in your career life!

recommendationHistory.caption: June 3, 2018, Michael worked with John but on different teams
recommendationHistory.description: Over the years I have often had the opportunity to work with John on customer-related quality issues. He always struck me by his commitment and passion for finding customer-friendly solutions. His approach to resolving issues was pragmatic and balanced, considering as far as practical all stakeholders' interests without sacrificing the final result . It was always a pleasure working with John and I feel strongly that he would be an asset to any organization that he is working for.

recommendationHistory.caption: May 16, 2018, Michael was John’s client

John supported me and the management team in creating the turnaround plan for the ABB Wettingen surge arrester factory in Switzerland. Thanks to his vast experience and expertise in manufacturing and lean management, we have succeeded in developing and implementing a solid plan. John is an enthusiastic leader and able to communicate with any employee / level in a multinational company. I can recommend John for any senior management position and would like to work with him in the future again. 
All the best and thank you John. Michael Gaechter May 2018

company.name: Liebherr Group
company.description:
Established in 1949, the Liebherr Group today is not only one of the biggest construction equipment manufacturers in the world, but also offers high-quality, user-oriented products and services in many other areas. The family-run technology company employs nearly 50,000 people in over 140 companies worldwide.
Liebherr’s product range includes the segments Earthmoving, Deep Foundation Machines, Mobile and Crawler Cranes, Tower Cranes, Concrete Technology, Material Handling Technology, Mining, Maritime Cranes, Aerospace and Transportation Systems, Gear Technology and Automation Systems, Refrigeration and Freezing, Components as well as Hotels in Ireland, Austria and Germany.
The Group’s parent company is Liebherr-International AG located in Bulle, Switzerland, which is entirely owned by members of the Liebherr family. 
Career possibilities can be found online: https://www.liebherr.com/en/deu/career/career.html

Imprint: https://www.liebherr.com/en/deu/disclaimer/imprint.html

person.headline: Quality Customer Manager EMEA
person.summary: With over 20 years of experience in the automotive industry, I am a passionate and dedicated Quality Customer Manager at Comet Plasma Control Technologies, a global leader in plasma and RF solutions. I work with customers across America, Europe, the Middle East, Africa and Asia to ensure their quality requirements are met and exceeded, using my skills in automobiles, vehicles, and business management. I also hold certifications in TOEIC, TFI, and SHAININ, demonstrating my proficiency in English, French, and problem-solving methodologies. Previously, I was a Quality Key Account Manager at Liebherr Group, where I took care of quality satisfaction for our customers, and a Customer Quality at Renault, where I was involved in various quality improvement projects. My mission is to deliver excellence in customer service and quality performance, and to contribute to the innovation and growth of Comet Plasma and its clients. I value teamwork, collaboration, and continuous learning, and I bring diverse perspectives and experiences to the quality management field.

company.name: Comet Plasma Control Technologies
company.tagline: Led by experience. Driven by curiosity.
company.description:
Comet Plasma Control Technologies (PCT) is a leading expert in RF (Radio Frequency) power delivery and a global innovation partner of RF related businesses. We design and manufacture high-tech products used to build semiconductors, commonly known as integrated circuits or computer chips. 

PCT’s products include impedance matching networks, RF generators and vacuum capacitors used by equipment and integrated circuit manufacturers in the semiconductor and related industries. Our products enable the latest cell phones, computers, and tablets to run faster, last longer and store more information.
If you want to improve reliability, throughput and yield, partner with Comet Plasma Control Technologies.

Comet Plasma Control Technologies is a globally leading Swiss technology firm and a member of the Comet Group.
